detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Bitcliq (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcliq.sol#92-197) has payable functions:
	 - Bitcliq.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcliq.sol#188-190)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
